title: ये व्यक्ति हैदराबाद में रहने वाले सुरेश कोचाट्टिल है
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: A few days ago, to be precise, on the day when Cyberabad Police knocked off the four accused in #Disha rape and murder case, i posted on Facebook, a video recorded on my mobile phone. It was a set of points that were going on in my mind and i just spoke.https://t.co/ZlHg714oAf
